== Video Overview ==

This video details how to get a printer working in Linux. It also goes through how to find out whether your printer will be supported by linux

== Target Audience ==

* Users who wish to produce printed output.
* Users who want to find out if a certain printer is supported by linux.

== Pre-requisites ==

* Must have a printer and necessary cables to connect printer to computer.

== Required Knowledge ==

* Must know make and model of printer.

== Recommended Knowledge ==

* None

== Objectives ==

* Identify whether printer is supported by Linux. - using http://openprinting.org
* * Show a supported printer
* * Show what it looks like if your printer is not supported
* Install a printer driver and configure the printer.
* Print from common desktop applications - OpenOffice, Firefox, Evolution
